title: How to invest in buy-to-let: where your £25,000 will earn the highest returns
text:
Do you want to invest in buy-to-let – but don't know how? In this four-part series, we find out where and how to invest in property in the UK with different budgets, from £15,000 to £100,000, and take a look at how far your money can take you.

In the second installment in our buy-to-let investment series, we’re looking at where a budget of £25,000 can buy you with a 25 per cent deposit. At this price bracket, your options dramatically open up.

There are 105 local authorities in the UK where the average flat or house price is less than £100,000, according to exclusive research by Hamptons International.

In the first part of the series, we examined the markets in north-west England, Scotland...
description: Do you want to invest in buy-to-let – but don't know how?
